title: How it Works
desc: Below are three easy steps to start your reading journey
step1desc: Search through the provided list of books to find your next read. Books are filtered by genre.
step2desc: Look through the book's description and save your favorite book for your next read!
step3desc: Read your next book, then come back to the website to leave a review on if you enjoyed the book. Reach out to us if you have any questions or concerns.
